content.text: Match ends, Espanyol 3, Valencia 1.
Second Half ends, Espanyol 3, Valencia 1.

Abraham González (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Éver Banega (Valencia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Attempt blocked. Sergio Canales (Valencia) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Juan Bernat.
Goal!  Espanyol 3, Valencia 1. Thievy (Espanyol) left footed shot from the right side of the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Manuel Lanzarote.
